data.label: Clear
data.description: Clear all the controls so you have a blank workspace

data.label: Reset
data.description: Reset all controls back to their defaults

data.label: Shift Left
data.description: Move a piece left once or hold for autoshift

data.label: Shift Right
data.description: Move a piece right once or hold for autoshift

data.label: Hard Drop
data.description: Drop a piece instantly to the floor. (may act differently or be disabled in some modes)

data.label: Soft Drop
data.description: Speed up a piece's descent (may act differently in some modes)
